å»£å‘Šå…§å®¹: Invitation  ã€€ã€€ To our most Respectful Mdm Legislator HO, ã€€ã€€ As we all know Dali and Taiping Districts are the key SMEs areas of Taichung City, hardwares, tools and etc are in favor of many international main buyers. In order to assist our SMEs to further plough into international market and link up with supply chain internationally, English speaking ability of industry employees has become an urgent and important issue.  ã€€ã€€ Sincerely invite Mdm HO to make a Public speech in English with me to talk about plans on how to improve and assist our SMEs in terms of ability to use English. ã€€ã€€ Please let us know your available time and we shall discuss with your office to make sure this event takes place as soon as possible. Looking forward to receiving your kind reply. ã€€ã€€ Best regards, The 7th District Legislative of Taichung, candidate Nico, CHUANG Zi Fu

å»£å‘Šè©³æƒ….ad_creative_body:
Invitation 
ã€€ã€€
To our most Respectful Mdm Legislator HO,
ã€€ã€€
As we all know Dali and Taiping Districts are the key SMEs areas of Taichung City, hardwares, tools and etc are in favor of many international main buyers. In order to assist our SMEs to further plough into international market and link up with supply chain internationally, English speaking ability of industry employees has become an urgent and important issue. 
ã€€ã€€
Sincerely invite Mdm HO to make a Public speech in English with me to talk about plans on how to improve and assist our SMEs in terms of ability to use English.
ã€€ã€€
Please let us know your available time and we shall discuss with your office to make sure this event takes place as soon as possible. Looking forward to receiving your kind reply.
ã€€ã€€
Best regards,
The 7th District Legislative of Taichung, candidate Nico, CHUANG Zi Fu
